Title: Senior React Developer
Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior React Developer to join our growing engineering team.

Key Responsibilities:
• Lead development of complex React applications
• Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
• Collaborate with product managers and designers
• Implement responsive web designs and user interfaces
• Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability

What We Offer:
• Competitive salary and equity package
• Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
• Flexible work arrangements and remote options
• Professional development opportunities
• Modern tech stack and collaborative environment
Requirements: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, Node.js, Git

Title: Digital Marketing Manager
Description:
Join our dynamic marketing team as a Digital Marketing Manager and drive our online presence to new heights.

Your Role Will Include:
• Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies
• Manage social media campaigns across multiple platforms
• Analyze campaign performance and optimize for better ROI
• Collaborate with sales team to generate qualified leads
• Create engaging content for various digital channels
• Oversee email marketing campaigns and automation workflows

Requirements:
• 3+ years of digital marketing experience
• Proven track record with Google Ads and Facebook advertising
• Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset
• Experience with marketing automation tools (HubSpot preferred)
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
Requirements: Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, HubSpot, Content Marketing, SEO, Email Marketing

Title: Product Manager
Description:
We're looking for a passionate Product Manager to drive product strategy and execution for our SaaS platform.

What You'll Do:
• Define product roadmap and prioritize features based on user feedback
• Conduct market research and competitive analysis
• Work closely with engineering team to deliver high-quality products
• Gather and analyze user requirements and feedback
• Create detailed product specifications and user stories
• Monitor product metrics and KPIs for continuous improvement

About You:
• 2-4 years of product management experience
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Experience with agile development methodologies
• Excellent stakeholder management abilities
• Data-driven decision making approach
• Technical background preferred but not required

Why Join Us:
• 100% remote work opportunity
• Equity participation in growing startup
• Unlimited PTO policy
• Annual learning and development budget
• Collaborative and inclusive team culture
Requirements: Product Management, User Research, Data Analysis, Agile, JIRA, Figma, SQL
